QuestionOperationsService - Class in fr.epita.quiz_manager.services
Description This QuestionOperationsService class is used to provide services: create, update, delete, search for Question object types, it includes 3 fields: @Inject private MCQChoiceDAO instance; @Inject private QuestionDAO instance; @Inject private SessionFactory instance; Usage This class should be used as follows: @Inject QuestionOperationsService instance;

QuestionService - Class in fr.epita.quiz_manager.web.services
Description This QuestionService class is used to expose services: create, update, delete, search for Question Usage This class should be used as follows: HOSTSERVER-IP-ADDRESS + desired Path, in case of running locally, point to localhost:8080

QuestionType - Enum in fr.epita.quiz_manager.datamodel
